messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] starting a Sudbury school/correction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/22/2004 9:04:17 PM Eastern Standard Time, HMSL2@aol.com writes: Heck Berwick Academy is well over 10,0000 and thats not to live there
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/22/2004 9:04:17 PM Eastern Standard Time, HMSL2@...
writes:
Heck Berwick Academy is well over 10,0000 and thats not to live there
either. Other local private schools around us are 3-4000.00 just for daily

Laura D>>>
***************************************************************
Opps sorry,
Written that looks wrong so I will clarify. Berwick Academy enrolls kids from
around the world so their tuition is way high at 10,000 boarding is extra.
The other local private schools are 3-4000 a year for just day school no sleep
ins.
Laura D


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
